result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaac Tyrese Wilson

records.addlTxt: 10:07 AM Defendant Isaac Tyrese Wilson in court in custody, with the Rock County Jail and with attorney Kelly James Mattingly.  David Zarwell appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court orders case dismissed and read in.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Activity:  Preliminary hearing and arraingment  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

02:14 PM Defendant Isaac Tyrese Wilson in court in custody by video from the Rock County Jail with attorney Kelly James Mattingly by video.  Alexander David Goulart appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.  Defendant pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set.  Bond continued.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 10, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Preliminary hearing on April 11, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Activity:initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

01:27 PM Defendant Isaac Tyrese Wilson in court by video in custody with attorney Kelly James Mattingly by video.  Alexander David Goulart appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond of $500 set. Preliminary hearing requested.

Activity: Hearing
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

4:04 PM Defendant Isaac Tyrese Wilson in court in custody at the Rock County Jail by video with attorney Ryan W O'Hara by video. Mason C Braunschweig appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney O'Hara states attorney Mattingly requests matter to be called with other cases with Judge Wood. Court remands case to Wood per request of attorney for initial appearance, bond not set.  Initial appearance scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
